Class MP3Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • javazoom.jl.player.advanced.AdvancedPlayer
      • com.jms.MP3Player

  • public class MP3Player
extends AdvancedPlayer
    Main class of MP3 player.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MP3Player

        public MP3Player()
          throws javazoom.jl.decoder.JavaLayerException
        Default constructor, creates instance of Playlist
        Throws:

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        public void addListener(PlayerEventListener listenerToAdd)
        This function adds an listener of the player events
        Parameters:
        listenerToAdd - - object which implements an PlayerEventListener interface, which is to react on the event

      • sendSongChangedEvt

        public void sendSongChangedEvt()
        This function sends an event to the GUI to inform it, which song is currently played in order to select it in playerDisplay

      • songTimeUpdateEvt

        public void songTimeUpdateEvt()
        This function sends an event to the GUI to update the time of the song

      • getCurrentSongSizeMs

        public float getCurrentSongSizeMs()
        Gets the current time of the song
        Returns:
        the current time in miliseconds

      • pauseSong

        public void pauseSong()
        Pauses the song on the currently played frame. If the state != STATE_PLAYING, it does nothing

      • resumeSong

        public void resumeSong()
        Resumes the paused song from the moment it was paused on. If the state != STATE_PAUSED, it does nothing

      • stopSong

        public void stopSong()
        Stops the currently played song and frees resources connected with it

      • executeTask

        public void executeTask()
        The main function which handles songs playing in different options: - in order from playlist - randomly from playlist - single song repeated - single song played only once - pause and resume - stop and start song from the beginning

      • playNextSong

        public void playNextSong()
        Stops the currently played song, and starts the next one on the playlist. If the last played song was the last on the list, than it plays the first one

      • playPrevSong

        public void playPrevSong()
        Stops the currently played song, and starts the previous one on the playlist. If the last played song was the first one on the list, than it plays the last one

      • playPlaylistItem

        public void playPlaylistItem(int playlistIndex)
        This function is responsible for playing the chosen song from the playlist. It stops currently played song and switches to the song with given playlist index
        Parameters:
        playlistIndex - - the index of the song to be played on the playlist

      • setPlaybackOrder

        public void setPlaybackOrder()
        Toggles the player setting wheter to play songs randomly or in order

      • setPlaylist

        public void setPlaylist(Playlist playlist)
        This is the setter, to set the playlist
        Parameters:
        playlist - - playlist ot set

      • setEqualizer

        public void setEqualizer(javazoom.jl.decoder.Equalizer equalizer)
        This is the setter for equalizer of the player
        Parameters:
        equalizer - - equalizer to be set

      • getCurrentlyOpenedFile

        public java.io.File getCurrentlyOpenedFile()
        Returns the currently opened(most currently played) file
        Returns:
        File

      • getPlaylist

        public Playlist getPlaylist()
        Returns the playlist which is set in the MP3Player
        Returns:

      • getEqualizer

        public javazoom.jl.decoder.Equalizer getEqualizer()
        Returns the equalizer which is set in the MP3Player
        Returns:

      • getPlaybackOrder

        public MP3Player.PlaybackOrder getPlaybackOrder()
        Gets the flag @ref playbackOrder value.
        Returns:
        PLAY_IN_ORDER - if the playlist is played in order PLAY_RANDOM - if the songs are chosen from the playlist randomly

      • setPlaybackOrder

        public void setPlaybackOrder(MP3Player.PlaybackOrder playbackOrder)
        This is setter for the flag @ref playbackOrder value.
        Parameters:
        playbackOrder - - PLAY_IN_ORDER - if the playlist is to be played in order PLAY_RANDOM - if the songs are to be chosen from the playlist randomly

      • getState

        public MP3Player.PlayerState getState()
        This function is getter for the current state of the Player
        Returns:
        state

        public void setState(MP3Player.PlayerState state)
        This is setter for the player state (deprecated)
        Parameters:
        state -

        public int getSongTotalTimeMs(java.io.File song)
        Parameters:
        song -
        Returns:

      • getSongTotalFrames

        public int getSongTotalFrames(java.io.File song)
        This function goes through entire song and counts the number of mp3 frames in it. It is useful for calculating the song total duration
        Parameters:
        song - - the song to check
        Returns:
        number of frames

      • getCurrentFrameNumber

        public int getCurrentFrameNumber()
        This is the getter for the current frame number. It is useful to calculate which second of the song is currently played bythe player
        Returns:
        the currently played frame number

      • getPlayerEventListeners

        public java.util.List<PlayerEventListener> getPlayerEventListeners()
        Returns list of PlayerEventListeners, mainly for test purposes
        Returns:
        list of PlayerEventListeners registered to this instance
